summary: Updates the appearance of the NPC Saadia from the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#ffff00]Please note, this mod has effectively been superseded by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75497/?]Noobshire NPCs[/url] and while it will remain available for download, may not receive further updates.  I'm trying to keep all the NPCs in one place for convenience, and reduce esp useage to one.  Thanks.[/color]

[color=#008000]Background:[/color][/size]
Saadia closes the door of the Bannered Mare, Brennuin has finally seen fit to find some place to doss for the night.
“Hulda.” Saadia says.
“What is it, dear?” the kindly barkeep replies as she clears up the last couple of tankards from around the bar.
“I... We need to talk.” she begins tentatively.
“Oh? About what?”
“You've been really good to me since I turned up here looking for a job.”
“Well? You're a good worker.”
“You've been more than just my boss. A friend.” Saadia smiles.
“Hm.” Hulda just chuckles.
“I need some time off.”
“Oh here we go...” Hulda frowns.
“It's not what you think.”
“Saadia?” Hulda attempts to prompt something tangible from the girl.
“I'm being hunted. By Alik'r warriors.”
“What?!” Hulda shouts and rushes to grab her sword from behind the bar. “Where are the bastards?!  I'll gut them myself!”
“Calm down, Hulda. They only know that I'm in Skyrim, not that I'm working here. Well, not yet.”
“What do they want? What did you do?” Hulda says, now with more concern for the girl than anger at her would be assassins.
“It's all wrapped up in Hammerfell politics. They see me as some kind of traitor but that could be said by either side depending on what you believe. That's why I need to head to Riften.”
“Riften? The face sculptor?” Hulda realises her intent. “Saadia, that could be dangerous...”
“And the alternative?” Saadia fiercely poses the question.
Hulda ponders a moment.
“Alright. Go. Do what you need to.” Hulda holds her arms up, knowing Saadia needs to do this.
“And Hulda? No-one must know of this, I'm trusting you with my life.”
“Don't worry, Saadia. Your secret is safe with me.”

And so Saadia, under the cover of night headed to Riften and the face sculptor did perform her work but alas, as much as Galathil tried, nothing could be done of the Redguard's scar as though it was a curse as much as a blemish. Only time will tell if this curse will be her undoing.

[color=green][size=3]Mod does what?[/size][/color]
Updates the appearance of the Bannered Mare tavern NPC and bar vendor, Saadia.

[color=green][size=3]Details:[/size][/color]
UNP and CBBE versions available - Click 'manual download' and select the body type to install.
This mod does not update any other NPCs or player defaults.
Standard non-bbp meshes included for compatibility.

[color=green][size=3]Requirements:[/size][/color]
Skyrim updated to the latest version.

[color=green][size=3]Installation:[/size][/color]
Install via NMM.
Manual installation – install manually. (is that 'joke' getting old now?)

[color=green][size=3]Un-Install:[/size][/color]
Un-install via NMM.
If uninstalling manually, as well as deleting the esp and textures/meshes, ensure that the facegendata for both textures and meshes are deleted to ensure no issues with vanilla appearance (ref: 00013BA2).

[color=green][size=3]Known issues:[/size][/color]
Imperfections.
If any other mods are running which update information or characters in the Bannered Mare cell and issues are experienced, swapping the load order of the mods should resolve it.

[color=green][size=3]Acknowledgements:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP Female Body[/url] by Dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition[/url] (CBBE) by Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20781/?]Project ENB[/url] used for the screenshots
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56613/?]Remodeled Armor for UNPB HDT TBBP[/url] by Logos used in screenshots, with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] retex by Cabal
Description text composed by fan fiction writer [url=https://archiveofourown.org/users/Stoob/works]Stuart James[/url] (AO3)
author: Noobshire
